content: चर्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [चर्-कर्मणि यत्] To be gone; to be practised &c. --र्या {@--1@} Going about, moving, walking about; driving or going in a carriage; रथ° <ls>U. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Course, motion; as in राहुचर्या. {@--3@} Behaviour, conduct, deportment. {@--4@} Practice, performance, observance; <ls>Ms. 1. 111</ls>; व्रतचर्य, तपश्चर्या. {@--5@} Regular performance of all rites or customs. {@--6@} Eating. {@--7@} A custom, usage; <ls>Ms. 6. 32.</ls> {@--8@} Pervading; visiting. --र्यं {@--1@} Going about. {@--2@} Behaviour, conduct.
